body:
Comment 1 by **zerohp**: 
It appears the compiler and linker are working correctly.  I copied the resulting binary
to another linux/386 machine and it runs correctly.

$ scp valkyrie.buick455.com:8.out .
8.out                                                             100%  115KB 115.2KB/s 
 00:00    
$ ./8.out 
hi
